subject: thank you notes 11/5/16
body: i'm thankful that as of today, i've been writing these thank you notes for a year. i'm thankful for everyone who has read them and everyone who has written their own. i'm thankful for what they add to my life and am thankful that every morning i feel excited to write them and send them to you.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that as of today, i've been writing these thank you notes for a year. i'm thankful for everyone who has read them and everyone who has written their own. i'm thankful for what they add to my life and am thankful that every morning i feel excited to write them and send them to you.
